name: LegendOfTheCheese - Ludum Dare 37
description:
Submission for ludum dare - 37. Theme: One Room.

You are a mouse who have entered a room filled with traps, and cheese, lots of cheese. Can you collect all the cheese before the cat catches you? Jump on the furniture, escape through mouse holes, and eat chocolate to regain your health.

Source files: https://github.com/TubbyS/LegendOfTheCheeseLudumDa...

(Requires Unity3d and playmaker to function properly)
